text: @Huawei I was considering purchasing a Huawei, for my next phone, their camera capabilities look amazing. I would not touch one now with a bargepole. I understand I will have to purchase certain Chinese goods, but I'll try and source goods closer. Source of Covid-19 and lied about it!!!!
